text:
This was a really wonderful apartment.  Myself and two friends stayed here for a couple of days - it was ideal for our stay and was only a short trip into the city. 



Apartment was really clean, warm and well taken care of - Lasata was really pleasant, and although we were a little late coming into the city there was no problem getting keys.



Would definitely recommend staying here for anyone looking to visit NYC.
title: 3BR Apt -Sunnyside (near Manhattan)
